name: catalytic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making a chemical reaction happen more quickly by using a catalyst: The compounds are formed through a catalytic reaction called oxidation. See
catalysis
More examplesFewer examplesLarger molecules can be broken into smaller ones in a process called catalytic cracking.The catalytic activity of enzymes is often dependent on the type of ions present in the reaction medium.Power plants have installed selective catalytic reduction units to reduce pollution.
